creditline: Gift of Daniel Greenberg and Susan Steinhauser
description: small flat foot; rounded, slightly squat body; diagonal ribs overall--slightly wider at shoulder; medium and dark brown
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

see Signed
signed: on bottom, incised: [#1217 / \"RHYTHMS / IN CHAOS\" / Wm. Hunter / \'95]
text: Since 1979, the spiral form has dictated much of Hunter's work.  Both Rhythms in Chaos and Bahia Blossom are from series he still pursues today, with carved flutes creating a voluptuousness of form.  From here Hunter started to open up his vessels by carving through the flutes, introducing voids, for example with Retusa Phantom.
title: Rhythms in Chaos
